Header.title: A product engineering and design services company
Header.paragraph: IoT, IIoT, Networking and 5G, Machine Vision, AI and ML, Cloud Computing and Mobile Apps...

About.paragraph: Technology savvy folks who firmly believes in producing artefacts which shall add value and thereby a sense of delight for our customers.

Services.name: Product Engineering
Services.text:
- IoT/IIoT Devices, Sensors, Gateways
- Network Devices, Routers, Switches
- 5G Radio Unit, RRH, Macrocell
- 5G DU/CU Server

Services.name: Embedded Hardware Design
Services.text:
- High Speed DigtalDesign
- Schematic Design, Board Layout
- RF and Antenna Design
- SI/PI/Thermal Analysis

Services.name: Embedded Software Design
Services.text:
- Embdedded Linux Developement
- RTOS and Baremetal Development
- Device Drivers and BSP Development
- Boot Loader and Kernel Porting

Services.name: Application Software
Services.text:
- Scalable Web Applications
- Native Mobilie/Desktop Aplications
- Cloud Backend Services
- UI/UX Design

Services.name: Machine Vision, AI/ML
Services.text:
- Text Extraction and Analytics
- Image/Video Processing
- Edge Analytics
- Video Management System

Services.name: Resource/Staff Augmentation
Services.text:
- Competent Resource Pool
- Project and Time Based Association
- Onsite/Offsite Association
- Longterm Resource Commitment
